pipeline.description: Displays credit card information and other payment related information and lets the user change it.

text-node.description: Renders a list of the saved credit card payment instruments of the current customer.
Provides functionality to add a new credit card payment instrument to the saved payment instruments of the current customer.
Deletes a saved credit card payment instrument.
JIRA PREV-39 : Credit card overlay is transformed into page. Replaced dialogjson with new template client redirect
